channel.title: Getting 99 hunter
channel.description: How long would it take for me to get 99 hunter at 62? Also, would anyone recommend a good guide?

item.title: Getting 99 hunter
item.dc:creator: @Christiaan Christiaan
item.description:
@Christiaan wrote:

I botted 99 hunter @ red chins and made 42M, you need 63 hunter for it but it gives around 60k exp/hr depending on your hunter level (at 98 hunter i had 74K/hr)

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:

Red chins stack bro.
[/quote]Didn’t know this, as I never made it past using the eagles. Though, you can use that method for any hunting area.[/quote]

Why did you give out the suggestion then.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:18, topic:387112”]There is something in runescape that gives you loads of paps at a time, iv forgot what but yeah… (not fruitbat).
The only other problem with grenwalls is they are far away from a bank…[/quote]

Grenwall spikes are stackable

item.title: Getting 99 hunter
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

Chassy13:

Aren’t red chins pretty much packed in every single world by bots?

Which is one major reason grenwalls are soooo much better.

So yea… If you have 69 summoning and access to the elf area, hunt grenwalls. Its no joke like 17k profit a grenwall, and somewhere around 300-350m profit to get 99 hunter. The only problem is you need to double hunt (hunt the bate for grenwalls while you hunt grenwalls) and need fruit bats to get a good supply of bate for the grenwall bate.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting 99 hunter
item.dc:creator: @Squirt_Ltd Squirt Ltd
item.description:
@Squirt_Ltd wrote:

botters ftw

Read full topic

item.title: Getting 99 hunter
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

I’ve been trolling the bots, and I’ve made one log out by breaking it.

The bots have set locations that they will place their boxes.

Simply place a box there before they do, and the bot will freeze up and wait for it to be removed, or crash.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting 99 hunter
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

I found it impossible to get a spot with red chins when I had to get the 65 req for nomad’s reqium but grey chins still gave me around 40-50k xp p/hr with four traps. You can always find an empty world for grey chins too which is a bonus

Read full topic

item.title: Getting 99 hunter
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

Im level 95, almost 96 (legit).

I got the levels a while back but I did chins, but if you want better xp with no profit, I suggest going to red sallies.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting 99 hunter
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:8, topic:387112”][quote author=Rash link=topic=482909.msg3536587#msg3536587 date=1300591836]

It only takes about 4 weeks from 1-99. If you stay dedicated, and do it for the experience, and not the money, you can get it fairly quick. Doing chins to 99 will result in ~30 - 40m (or more, depending on the prices) but takes a bit more time because of trips, banking, etc.

Though, a good way to do it:
Buy 1-2 super energies
Buy 1 varrock tele tab
Buy 1 ring of dueling / yanille tele tab

Go to yanille/c wars

Run to chins (use energy pots if to increase speed)

Get full inventory

Tele to varrock

Sell to ge

Buy more supplies (mentioned above)

Vain, how will you get a full inventory when what your hunting stacks?
[/quote]
He’s implying I will get multiple 2147mil stacks[/quote]

If only…

Read full topic
